android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.info: use the authentication credentials of an account
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.description: Allows an application to request authentication tokens.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows an application to access the list of accounts known by the phone.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.google.android.gms.measurement.AppMeasurementInstallReferrerReceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

binary_analysis.title: Found elf built without Position Independent Executable (PIE) flag
binary_analysis.desc: In order to prevent an attacker from reliably jumping to, for example, a particular exploited function in memory, Address space layout randomization (ASLR) randomly arranges the address space positions of key data areas of a process, including the base of the executable and the positions of the stack, heap and libraries. Built with option -pie.

playstore_details.title: Glassdoor Jobs & Career - find jobs, apply today
playstore_details.description:
Find jobs, salary references and company reviews in one handy place, with the Glassdoor app. Upload your resume and tap into the world’s most comprehensive career community, straight from your phone.

Job search and career builder on the go - read the freshest job openings and honest company reviews, wherever you are. Plus, you can find out what it's really like to work for companies; from office culture to salaries, we've got everything you need to know to follow your dream career and discover a job you'll love!

Career builder, job search, mobile resume & more: 5 amazingly useful features on the Glassdoor app:

1. Job search - Our powerful job search tool automatically finds the most suitable new vacancies for you among millions of job openings
2. Company reviews - Know what former and current employees really think and see salaries and the office culture
3. Apply on the go - Save jobs or apply directly from your phone so you'll never miss out on a good career opportunity (just look for the ‘Apply on Phone’ label)
4. Interview Questions & Reviews - Got an interview? Prepare by reading typical questions and interview experiences
5. Find jobs suited to you - We'll alert you when we see new jobs listings that match your job search

Get access to the latest job openings as well as company reviews and salary reports, shared by those who know the company best – the employees. You can also upload your resume so you’re always ready to apply. Job-hunting has never been so transparent, easy, and efficient.

Download your career builder now and find jobs, apply on the go and read about the work and office details that really matter to you:

Salaries and more
• Use the 'Know Your Worth' tool to reveal how your market value has trended over time, how it compares to typical workers in the same field, and also plot your current base salary
• See salary and compensation by company, job title and location

Job Search & Vacancy Alerts
• Receive instant push notifications as soon as we find job openings suited to you
• Quickly create a saved search for any job title and location of interest
• Easily see which job openings are new in the last day

Apply On Your Phone
• Save jobs or apply directly from your phone so you'll never miss out on a good opportunity (just look for the 'Apply on Phone' label)
• Swipe on a job listing to email it over, view the company profile or follow the company and more
• Upload your resume so you can easily apply, wherever you are

Company Reviews, Salaries & more
• Read reviews from employees about the work environment, culture, senior leaders and more
• View pros, cons, and advice to senior management
• Get opinions from current and former employees about specific companies

Follow Companies
• Follow your favorite companies to get the latest updates
• Easily find your way back to the companies you love on the "Companies" tab
• Get relevant suggestions for new companies to follow

Job Interview Questions & Reviews
• Read reviews from applicants about the interview experience
• See job interview questions that top companies are asking


Download your career builder and job search now and apply for your next job now, with Glassdoor.
playstore_details.summary: Job search, salaries & company reviews - find your next job and apply today
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Job search, salaries & company reviews - find your next job and apply today
